T02D2949:27b-0: @27b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2949:27b-1: rigs kyi khro bo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur
T02D2949:27b-2: bar 'dod pa'i gang zag sgrub pa po dam tshig
T02D2949:27b-3: dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par rigs
T02D2949:27b-4: kyi khro bo bzhi'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas sa'i
T02D2949:27b-5: cho ga la sogs pa sngon du song bas dkyil
T02D2949:27b-6: 'khor gru gsum pa rab tu mnyam pa la /
T02D2949:27b-7: thig dang tshon gyis lugs bzhin byas la /
T02D2949:27b-8: dbus su gru gsum nag po la bla gam dmar
T02D2949:27b-9: po mu khyud ljang gus bskor ba 'khor lo rtsibs
T02D2949:27b-10: bzhi pa ser po rtsibs mchan dmar po mu khyud
T02D2949:27b-11: dkar po sna tshogs rdo rje'i rabs bskor ba /
T02D2949:27b-12: sgo bzhi rigs dang mthun pa khyams dang 'dod yon
T02D2949:27b-13: gyis mdzes par byas la mu khyud dang me ri
T02D2949:27b-15: rdo rje'i rabs mdzes par byas pa bris la /
T02D2949:28a-0: @28a * // lha so so'i mtshan ma gdab bo //
T02D2949:28a-1: de nas bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa lnga
T02D2949:28a-2: la las thams cad pa'i sngags kyi phyag rgyas bsangs
T02D2949:28a-3: la / gtso bo dang khro bo bzhi'i mtshan mas btab la /
T02D2949:28a-4: lha so so'i gnas su bzhag go //
T02D2949:28a-5: shing gdug pa can las byas pa'i phur bu bzhi la dar mthing nag gi cod pan gdags /
T02D2949:28a-6: aom tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2949:28a-7: zhes shar sgor btsugs la rdo rje rigs kyi las thams cad pa'i khro bor bskyed do //
T02D2949:28a-8: aom tstshindha tstshindha ma h'a k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2949:28a-9: zhes pas phur bu gcig lho sgor btsugs la rin
T02D2949:28a-10: po che'i rigs kyi las thams cad pa'i khro bor
T02D2949:28a-11: bskyed do // aom tsu ru tsu ru tsanda li k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2949:28a-12: zhes pas padma'i rigs kyi las thams cad pa'i khro bor bskyed la nub sgor gzugs so //
T02D2949:28a-13: aom bhandha bhandha kro dha k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2949:28a-14: byang sgor btsugs la las kyi rigs thams cad pa'i khro bor bskyed do //
T02D2949:28a-15: dkyil 'khor gyi grva bzhi la gtor ma sha sna
T02D2949:28a-16: tshogs pa dang ldan pa bzhi bzhag / gzhan yang
T02D2949:28a-17: mchod pa'i bye brag ji lta 'byor pa bsham /
T02D2949:28a-18: phyogs skyong ba dang bgegs la sogs pa'i gtor ma btang zhing bar chad bsal ba'i sbyor ba bya'o //
T02D2949:28a-19: de nas sngags pa bdag nyid kyis bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor bsangs te /
T02D2949:28a-20: lag pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa ltar bya ste /
T02D2949:28a-21: g-yon 'khor lo'i snod thugs kar 'dzin par byas la shar gyi bum pa la dmigs te /
T02D2949:28a-22: aom tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2949:28a-23: zhes brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pas /
T02D2949:28a-24: khro bo badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D2949:28a-25: g-yas pas rdo rje rtse gsum pa gdengs pa 'phyar ba /
T02D2949:28a-26: g-yon pas 'khor los mtshan pa'i thod pa thugs kar 'dzin pa /
T02D2949:28a-27: ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil pa /
T02D2949:28a-28: thod pa dang sprul gyis brgyan pa /
T02D2949:28a-30: spyan gsum pa zhal bgrad pa zhing chen gyi yol
T02D2949:28a-31: bas bskor ba la dar nag gi 'phur lces brgyan
T02D2949:28a-33: gcan gzan sna tshogs pas sku smad brgyan pa bum par bskyed do //
T02D2949:28a-34: lho phyogs kyi bum pa la dmigs te /
T02D2949:28a-35: aom tstshindha tstshindha ma h'a k'i li k'i l'a ya
T02D2949:28a-36: sv'a h'a zhes brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pas k'i la
T02D2949:28b-0: ya ser nag zhal @28b gcig phyag gnyis pa g-yas
T02D2949:28b-1: rin po che'i snye ma 'dzin pa /
T02D2949:28b-2: g-yon phur bu thugs kar 'dril ba /
T02D2949:28b-3: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa snga ma bzhin du bskyed do //
T02D2949:28b-4: nub kyi bum pa la dmigs la g-yas pa sdong po ltar byas la /
T02D2949:28b-5: g-yon phur ba ltar byas la /
T02D2949:28b-6: aom tsu ru tsu ru tsanda li k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2949:28b-7: zhes brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pas dmar po k'i li
T02D2949:28b-8: k'i l'a ya dmar nag zhal gcig gnyis pa g-yas
T02D2949:28b-9: me 'bar ba / g-yon phur bu thugs kar 'dril ba /
T02D2949:28b-10: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa snga ma bzhin du bskyed do //
T02D2949:28b-11: byang du g-yas na rin po che'i dbyug to 'phyar ba ltar byas la /
T02D2949:28b-12: g-yon phur pa ltar byas la /
T02D2949:28b-13: aom bandha bandha kro dha k'i li k'i l'a ya
T02D2949:28b-14: sv'a h'a zhes brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pas gtum po
T02D2949:28b-15: k'i la ya mdog ljang nag g-yas rin po che'i
T02D2949:28b-16: dbyug to thod pas mtshan pa 'dzin pa /
T02D2949:28b-17: g-yon phur bu thugs kar 'dzin pa snga ma dang 'dra bar bskyed do //
T02D2949:28b-18: dbus su rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog
T02D2949:28b-19: mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g-yas 'khor lo
T02D2949:28b-21: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2949:28b-22: aom na mashtsanda badzra kro dh'a ya sv'a h'a bskyed do //
T02D2949:28b-23: de nas lha so so'i sems dpa' spyan drangs te /
T02D2949:28b-24: gnyis su med par bstims la ye shes sems dpa'i
T02D2949:28b-25: thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo
T02D2949:28b-26: rje kha gyes pa'i bum bar h'um /
T02D2949:28b-27: de la so so'i sngags kyis bskor ba'i rang sgra la dmigs la /
T02D2949:28b-29: aom na mashtsanda badzra kro dh'a ya hu lu hu lu /
T02D2949:28b-31: ha na ha na aa mri te h'um phat ces
T02D2949:28b-32: bum pa re re la stong phrag gsum bzlas te
T02D2949:28b-33: / brgya brgya'i bar du p'u dza dbul lo //
T02D2949:28b-34: de ltar rdzogs nas slob ma la las kyi bum pa'i khrus nas gtor la /
T02D2949:28b-35: gos gsar ba gom la phreng ba dang me tog gzung la dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang /
T02D2949:28b-36: me tog gang la phog pa'i lha ngos bstan pa dang /
T02D2949:28b-38: de nas gtor ma sil snyan sna tshogs pa dang bcas pas nags tshal gyi gling du bskyal lo //
T02D2949:28b-39: de nas slob ma'i don du drag shul spyod pa'i sbyin sreg lan bdun bya'o //
T02D2949:28b-42: sbyin sreg thal ba mnan las byas la sbyar /
T02D2949:28b-43: bla ma la yon dpul tshogs ji ltar rigs pa bsags /
T02D2949:29a-0: @29a * // bzlas pa ji ltar bya ba'i lung bstan pa bzlas pa la dus thams cad du brtson par bya /
T02D2949:29a-1: srung ba'i 'khor lo yang mgul du gdags so //
T02D2949:29a-2: bdud rtsi thab sbyor zhes bya ba khro bo bzhi'i
T02D2949:29a-3: dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga zab mo
